defs: (masc.) one whose profession is cooking of food; a cook.
a female cook.
(pl.) persons who cook.
a chain (usu. of silver) with tiny jingling bells for wearing round the ankle.
to pull (a plant etc.) up from ground together with its root; to uproot.
to fail to move on the feet; to falter while walking.
to lose strength in moving or running an organisation, business etc.
to lose one's support.
to prostrate before another's feet, in obeisance or in supplication.
to fall down with the root or bottom support.
to fall down losing one's strength.
the work of cooking and supplying drinking water.
a bottom covering for the human foot, used while walking; a foot-wear.
(masc.) a cook, (esp. a Brāhmaṇa cook).
a place where food is cooked; kitchen.
to cook or prepare food.
= ಅಡಿಗೆಮಾಡು.

sodium chloride; common salt, a food-grade salt.
a line drawn beneath a word, a group of words or a sentence; an underline.

an artificial diamond.
a man whose profession is cooking; a cook.

to lower in rank or esteem; to treat disgracefully; to humble.

a person who seeks, is seeking, humbly some food, money or help from others; an indigent person.
a wooden block on which carpenters shape the timber; a wooden anvil.
to run away; to take to heels.
the hard part on the bottom of the feet of animals such as cattle, horses, etc.
an important fort that is under one's direct control.
a wooden bar for preventing the door from being opened.
a big wooden spoon with a long handle and a deep cup-shaped part at one end, used for serving liquid foods; a wooden ladle.
a note printed or written at the bottom of a page of a book or article and which gives extra information about something that has been written on that page; a footnote.
the long piece of wood or steel along the bottom of a boat that forms part of its structure and helps to keep the boat balanced in the water; keel.
to bow the head down (as from sorrow or disgrace).

= ಅಡಿಗೊರಡು.
a kind of sword.
the bottom part of the human foot; the sole of the foot.

(fig.) a lotus-like foot.

to wash the feet (of elders, in respect).
to run away; to take to heels.
to reveal the secret.

water retained in the wet field after the last crop of the year is harvested.

a note of comment, reference or explanation at the bottom of a page.

the blunt end of a spear.

ಅಟ್ಟಿಕ್ಕು aṭṭikku to cook and serve the food; ಅಟ್ಟೇಱಿಸು aṭṭērisu to keep the food cooked and ready; ಅಟ್ಟ ಪಾಯಸದಲ್ಲಿ ಕೆರ ಹೆಟ್ಟು aṭṭa pāyasadalli kera heṭṭu (prov.) to spoil another's hard work; ಅಟ್ಟಮೇಲೆ ಒಲೆ ಉರಿಯಿತು, ಕೆಟ್ಟಮೇಲೆ ಬುದ್ಧಿ ಬಂತು aṭṭamēle ole uriyitu, keṭṭamēle buddhi bantu (prov.) got the wisdom only when it was too late; ಅಟ್ಟರೂ, ಶಿವ ಕೊಟ್ಟಲ್ಲದೆ ಇಲ್ಲ aṭṭarū Śiva koṭṭallade illa (prov.) mundane wealth, unless bestowed by the God, cannot carry you anywhere; ಅಟ್ಟಿಕ್ಕುವವನಿಗೆ ಹೆಂಡತಿಯಾಗಬೇಡ, ಮೊಟ್ಟೆಮಾರುವವನಿಗೆ ಆಳಾಗಬೇಡ aṭṭikkuvavanige heṇḍatiyāgabēḍa, moṭṭehoruvavanige āḷāgabēḍa (prov.) do not be a slave to a slave; ಅಟ್ಟಿ ಉಣ್ಣುವುಡಕ್ಕಿಂತ ತಿರುದುಣ್ಣುವುದು ಲೇಸು aṭṭi uṇṇuvudakkinta tiridu uṇṇuvudu lēsu (prov.) it is easy to live by begging, than by hard work; ಅಟ್ಟಿಕ್ಕಿದವರಿಗಿಂತ ಆರಿಸಿಕ್ಕಿದವರು ಮೇಲಾಗು (prov.) (said of a man who is more kind to his wife than to his mother) labours are forgotten fast, while shallow sympathy is extolled a lot; ಅಡುವಾಗ, ಇಕ್ಕುವಾಗ ಊರೆಲ್ಲಾ ನೆಂಟರು aḍuvāga ikkuvāga ūrellā neṇṭaru (prov.) people throng around you when you can help them, but not when you need help; ಅಡುವುದು ಗುಂಡಳಿಗೆ, ಬಡಿಸುವುದು ಬೀಸಳಿಗೆ aḍuvudu guṇḍaḷige, baḍisuvudu bīsaḷige (prov.) bad conduct; ill-behaviour.
an obsolete coin of half the value of a gold coin.
a cutting cross-wise.
a cross-section of a cutting; a transverse section.
(dial.) a disease concomitant to another disease.
a mixed breed or caste.
want of attention; absence of the mind; inadvertence; abstraction.
a foot with front portion turned inwards.
a walking with the front portion of the foot turned inwards.
a protective metal plate against sword or spear attack; a shield.
a defensive heavy beam used by the vanguard against sword or spear attack.
a beam laid cross-wise.

a troop of soldiers holding the protective metal-shield.
